original_text: People swear by someone greater than themselves, and the oath confirms what is said and puts an end to all argument.
korean_text: 사람들은 자기보다 더 큰 자를 가리켜 맹세하나니 맹세는 그들이 다투는 모든 일의 최후 확정이니라

sentences.original_text: People swear by someone greater than themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 자기보다 더 위대한 존재를 두고 맹세합니다

sentences.original_text: and the oath confirms what is said
and puts an end to all argument
